name: ZSNES Slot 6 Saved State File
summary: Learn about .ZS6 files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: ZSNES provides numerous save states from 0 to 99 (file extensions .ZS0, .ZS1, .ZS2, and so on). To change the save state slot file that is used, press the "F3" key and use the arrow keys to navigate to the desired state.

NOTE: A ZSNES save state is not the same as an in-game save state. A game may only allow a user to save state at specific game milestones whereas ZSNES save states can be created at any time during gameplay.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
